name: SPARK-facedetection
tagline: Scalability, Pricing And Robustness benchmarK for face detection
body:
<script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/Chart.js/2.1.6/Chart.js"></script>

### Description

[FDDB](http://vis-www.cs.umass.edu/fddb/) and [MALF](http://www.cbsr.ia.ac.cn/faceevaluation/) are benchmarks for face detection in the wild (in unconstrained settings).
On benchmarks for face detection in the lab (in constrained settings, such as constrained scalability and robustness) always,
both evaluation criterion precision and recall.
benchmark for face detection in the use
(in constrained precision and recall), evaluation criterion price
scalability on the number of detected faces and robustness against small face size, yaw/pitch/roll, facial expression, occlusion, shadow.
We 

1. the most comprehensive collection of benchmarks for face detection in the lab and face detection in the use (8 benchmarks), and
2. the most comprehensive list of commercialized face detection (total 62).

This could help people purchase face detection.

### Reference

W.-L. Wang and J.-H. Chuang, "SPARK: scalability, pricing and robustness benchmark for face detection," _Technical Report, Dept. of Computer Science, National Chiao Tung University, Hsinchu, Taiwan_, 2016.

BibTeX entry:

    @TechReport{wang16,
      author      = {W.-L. Wang and J.-H. Chuang},
      title       = {{SPARK}: scalability, pricing and robustness benchmark for face detection},
      institution = {Dept. of Computer Science, National Chiao Tung University},
      address     = {Hsinchu, Taiwan},
      year        = {2016},
    }

Citing is caring :thumbsup:

### Contact

Wei-Lin Wang - [weblinkwang@gmail.com](mailto:weblinkwang@gmail.com)

### Resources

Standalone face detection software (total 55): [Acsys](http://www.acsysbiometrics.com/), [Affectiva](http://www.affectiva.com/solutions/apis-sdks/), [AMP Lab](http://chenlab.ece.cornell.edu/projects/FaceTracking/), [Android](https://developers.google.com/vision/), [Aurola](http://www.facerec.com/), [AuthenMetric](http://www.authenmetric.com/), [Aware](http://www.aware.com/biometrics/nexa-face/#nexa-face), [Ayonix](http://ayonix.com/products/ayonix-faceid-sdk/), [Bayometric](https://www.bayometric.com/nitgen-nac-5000-face-fingerprint-access-control-system/), [Betaface](http://www.betaface.com/), [CCV](http://libccv.org/), [CLandmark](http://cmp.felk.cvut.cz/~uricamic/clandmark/), [CloudWalk](http://www.cloudwalk.cn/), [Cognitec](http://www.cognitec.com/), [ColorReco](http://www.colorreco.com/), [CI2CV](http://face.ci2cv.net/), [Deep Face Representation](https://github.com/AlfredXiangWu/face_verification_experiment), [Dlib](http://blog.dlib.net/2014/02/dlib-186-released-make-your-own-object.html), [Eyedea](http://www.eyedea.cz/), [Eyeris](http://emovu.com/e/developers/), [Face++](http://www.faceplusplus.com/), [Faceall](http://www.faceall.cn/), [FaceFirst](http://www.facefirst.com/), [FacePhi](http://tech.facephi.com/en/), [Face-Tek](http://www.face-tek.com/e_product.php), [Facevisa](http://www.facevisa.com/), [Faceware](http://facewaretech.com/products/software/analyzer/), [Fdlib](http://people.kyb.tuebingen.mpg.de/kienzle/facedemo/facedemo.htm), [Fraunhofer IIS](http://www.iis.fraunhofer.de/en/ff/bsy/dl/shore.html), [Imacondis](http://facesdk.eu/), [IMC Lab](http://vision.sysu.edu.cn/systems/surveillance/), [Insky](http://www.insky.so/), [Kinect](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/jj130970.aspx), [libface](http://libface.sourceforge.net/), [libfacedetection](https://github.com/ShiqiYu/libfacedetection), [Linkface API](https://www.linkface.cn/), [Luxand](http://www.luxand.com/facesdk/), [M. Hammond](https://github.com/mc-jesus/face_detect_n_track), [Neurotechnology](http://www.neurotechnology.com/verilook.html), [Noldus](http://www.noldus.com/facereader/facereader-api), [O. Sakhi](http://www.mathworks.com/matlabcentral/fileexchange/29834-face-detection-using-support-vector-machine--svm-), [OpenBR](http://openbiometrics.org/), [OpenCV](http://opencv.org/), [OpenFace](https://cmusatyalab.github.io/openface/), [OpenIMAJ](http://www.openimaj.org/), [pci-suntektech](http://products.suntektech.com/products/intelligent-security/content20140605001/index.jsp?catid=223|322&id=359), [PersonID](http://360biometrics.com/face-recognition.php), [PUX](http://pux.co.jp/en/product/softsensor-en/faceu/), [Semantic Vision Tech.](http://www.semanticvisiontech.com/), [S. Hussain](https://sites.google.com/site/sibtulhussain/code), [Sightcorp](http://sightcorp.com/crowdsight/), [Tastenkunst](http://www.tastenkunst.com/), [TCIT](http://www.tcit-us.com/), [TVPlay](http://www.tvplay.cn/index.php?m=content&c=index&a=lists&catid=17), [Visage Tech.](http://visagetechnologies.com/), [Visual Geometry Group](http://www.robots.ox.ac.uk/~vgg/software/vgg_face/), [Windows](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/windows/hardware/mt450467(v=vs.85).aspx), [Windows Phone](http://research.microsoft.com/en-us/projects/facesdk/), [X. Zhu](https://www.ics.uci.edu/~xzhu/face/).

Face detection web services (total 24): [AllGo Embed. Sys.](http://www.allgovision.com/face-recognition.php), [AuthenMetric](http://www.authenmetric.com/), [Baidu](http://apistore.baidu.com/apiworks/servicedetail/464.html), [Betaface](http://www.betafaceapi.com/), [BioID](https://playground.bioid.com/), [CloudWalk](http://www.cloudwalk.cn/), [Eyeris](http://emovu.com/e/developers/), [Face++](http://www.faceplusplus.com/), [Faceall](http://www.faceall.cn/), [FaceR](http://www.facerapp.com/), [FaceRect](http://apicloud.me/apis/facerect/demo/), [Facevisa](http://www.facevisa.com/), [Lambda Labs](http://www.lambdal.com/), [Google](https://cloud.google.com/vision/), [Kairos](https://www.kairos.com/face-recognition-api), [KeyLemon](https://developers.keylemon.com/documentation/reference), [Linkface SDK](https://www.linkface.cn/), [Meerkat](http://www.meerkat.com.br/solution_fr.html), [Microsoft](https://www.microsoft.com/cognitive-services/en-us/face-api), [nViso](http://www.nviso.ch/), [Oddcast](http://www.oddcast.com/dev/facedetectionAPI/), [SkyBiometry](https://skybiometry.com/), [Stupefix](https://developer.stupeflix.com/tasks/image.face/), [Tencent](https://open.youtu.qq.com/), [VisionLabs](http://www.visionlabs.ru/).

Datasets and benchmarks: [A. Ess](https://data.vision.ee.ethz.ch/cvl/aess/dataset/), [Caltech](http://www.vision.caltech.edu/Image_Datasets/CaltechPedestrians/), [Ext. Yale B](http://vision.ucsd.edu/~iskwak/ExtYaleDatabase/ExtYaleB.html), [FDDB](http://vis-www.cs.umass.edu/fddb/), [INRIA](http://pascal.inrialpes.fr/data/human/), [LFW](http://vis-www.cs.umass.edu/lfw/), [MALF](http://www.cbsr.ia.ac.cn/faceevaluation/), [MI3](https://sites.google.com/site/miirsurveillance/), [NCKU Robotics Lab](http://robotics.csie.ncku.edu.tw/Databases/FaceDetect_PoseEstimate.htm), [Pointing'04](http://www-prima.inrialpes.fr/Pointing04/data-face.html), [SCface](http://www.scface.org/), [SCfaceDB](http://atvs.ii.uam.es/scfacedb_landmarks.html), [WIDER FACE](http://mmlab.ie.cuhk.edu.hk/projects/WIDERFace/).
